title: Lavender
description: This purple weed smells great and good for those weak knees

title: Wheat
description: By boiling this you can make some wicked porridge with this... Mmm... porridge.

title: Chamomile
description: Trouble getting in bed? Make some daisy tea. Trouble getting it on? Can't help you there.

title: Crude Oil
description: Slippery when applied to the ground. Be careful so you don't fall for it yourself.

title: Rock Salt
description: Lick it. You won't regret it!

title: Death Cap
description: This is one colorful but ominous looking mushroom

title: Vampire's Bite
description: A harrowing flower, you can feel its blood lust coming from the petals

title: Nirnroot
description: A common and yet a hideous and ugly looking root with many uses
